basics.name: George Nishimura
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: George is a full-stack software developer interested in user experience and problem-solving. He is currently studying in his final year at Imperial College, and has previously interned at Upstatement and Microsoft.

work.summary: 5-month internship at Upstatement,Upstatement is a small web design firm in Boston specializing in building modern, responsive sites for editorial clients
highlights: Built and maintained full-stack (front-end, back-end, server admin) for the Lattice Engines site
Created dummy post generation Wordpress plugins in PHP
Wrote open-source Javascript libraries Quickshare and Skrollr.Utilities

work.summary: 12-week internship at Microsoft's Redmond Campus as part of the Surface Music Kit app team in the Windows Division
highlights: Development of internal ASP.Net MVC web app
Windows App UI Automation and tools script authoring
Feature test owner and member of scrum

work.summary: Annual mentoring of high school students in Team 1884, the UK's only First Robotics Competition team
highlights: Fellowship award winner, former captain and member since 07/08
Teach strategy, engineering design, programming & electronics

highlights.summary: Summer employment as part of the technology team at an international K-12 school
highlights: Independently managed migrating Virtual Learning Environment
